entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain showers near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 3.
